short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a browser notification when you Circle CI job finishes!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click the bell icon next to your Circle CI jobs to get a browser notification when your job succeeds or fails. Leave the Circle CI tab open to ensure you receive the notification.
